body:
Adds packages for two software pieces from Argonne National Laboratory.

NRM, a node-local resource manager: https://xgitlab.cels.anl.gov/argo/nrm
libnrm, its application interfacing library: https://xgitlab.cels.anl.gov/argo/libnrm

Also adds three json schema related python dependencies for NRM.
title: libnrm,nrm,py-jsonpatch,py-jsonpointer,py-warlock: New packages.
